name: Task Executor

data.prompt:
Simulate the execution of this task:

{{task}}

With these parameters:
{{parameters}}

Provide:
1. Step-by-step simulation of what would happen
2. Expected results
3. Potential issues that might arise
4. Recommendations for successful execution

Return your simulation as detailed, easy-to-understand text for someone with no technical background.

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Modify the agent's capabilities based on natural language instructions

components.title: Self Modify
components.description: Modifies the agent based on instructions

data.prompt:
Generate SmythOS Agent Description Language (ADL) code to modify the agent according to these instructions:

{{instructions}}

The modifications should:
1. Be user-friendly and well-documented
2. Include appropriate error handling
3. Have clear input/output relationships
4. Follow best practices for component design

Return only valid ADL code that can be executed to update the agent.

data.description: Deploy an application based on specifications

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Log an action that the agent has performed

components.title: Log Action
components.description: Logs an action performed by the agent

components.name: FTimestamp
components.title: Timestamp
components.description: Creates a timestamp for the log entry

components.name: APICall
components.title: Store Log
components.description: Stores the log entry in a database

data.prompt:
Summarize the following log entries in clear, non-technical language:

{{logs}}

Include:
1. Total number of entries
2. Most common action types
3. Key activities and their outcomes
4. Any patterns or issues worth noting

Make this summary understandable for someone with no technical background.

data.description: Process a natural language task instruction

data.prompt:
Analyze the following task:

{{task}}

Break it down into:
1. Task type (deployment, self-modification, general task, etc.)
2. Required parameters
3. Expected outcome
4. Potential risks
5. Steps to execute

Return your analysis as JSON with these fields.

Classify the {{task_type}} into one of these categories:
self_modify - if the task involves changing the agent's capabilities or workflows
deploy - if the task involves deploying an application
simulation - if the task is about predicting outcomes
general - for any other task type

Set the selected category to true and the others to empty value

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Create a simulation of what would happen if the task was executed

components.title: Simulate Task
components.description: Creates a simulation of task execution

data.prompt:
Create a deployment plan for a {{app_type}} application to {{target_platform}} with these specifications:

{{specifications}}

Include:
1. Step-by-step deployment process
2. Required resources
3. Configuration details
4. Post-deployment verification steps

The plan should be detailed enough for automated execution.

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Process and execute provided code based on instructions

components.title: Process Code
components.description: Receives code and instructions for processing

data.prompt:
Analyze the following code and instructions:

Code:
```{{language}}
{{code}}
```

Instructions:
{{instructions}}

Provide the following:
1. A summary of what the code does
2. Any potential issues or improvements
3. How to execute it based on the instructions
4. Expected outputs and behavior

Format your analysis as structured JSON with these fields.

components.name: Code
components.title: Code Executor
components.description: Executes JavaScript code in a sandbox

components.name: APIOutput
components.title: Code Results
components.description: Returns code analysis and execution results

data.description: Generate code from natural language specifications

data.prompt:
Generate {{language}} code based on these specifications:

{{specifications}}

{{#if framework}}Use the {{framework}} framework for implementation.{{/if}}

Your response should include:
1. Complete, well-documented code
2. Brief explanation of how the code works
3. Instructions for implementation
4. Any necessary dependencies

Format the code with appropriate syntax highlighting.

components.name: APIOutput
components.title: Generated Code
components.description: Returns the generated code and instructions

data.description: Update information about the agent's purpose, goals, or progress status
Retrieve information about the agent's purpose, goals, and progress status

components.name: APICall

data.body:
{
  "purpose": "Autonomous application development platform capable of building cross-platform applications (OS, Browser, Mobile, Android, iOS) from natural language instructions or code provided by authorized users or connected AI systems.",
  "goals": "1. Establish self-modification capabilities from provided instructions
2. Implement reliable code generation, testing, execution, and reporting workflows
3. Develop standalone operational capability independent of SmythOS
4. Create browser-based UI for interaction
5. Establish secure API connections with external AI systems
6. Implement version control and deployment integration",
  "progress": "Initial framework established with the following capabilities:
1. Task processing and classification system
2. Task simulation capability
3. Self-modification workflow
4. Deployment planning and execution
5. Logging infrastructure
6. Code processing and generation
7. Context management system",
  "next_steps": "1. Implement code testing capabilities
2. Develop standalone runtime environment
3. Create browser-based UI interface
4. Establish API connections with external systems (ChatGPT)
5. Integrate with GitHub and deployment platforms (Vercel)
6. Enhance security protocols for access control",
  "success_criteria": "1. Successfully self-modifies based on natural language instructions
2. Generates, tests, and executes code with >90% success rate
3. Operates independently of SmythOS platform
4. Securely connects with external AI systems
5. Maintains comprehensive execution logs and audit trails
6. Successfully deploys applications to production environments
7. Accessible through intuitive UI for authorized users
8. Demonstrates error recovery and resilience",
  "integration_points": "1. External AI Systems (ChatGPT API)
2. Version Control (GitHub)
3. Deployment Platforms (Vercel)
4. Testing Frameworks
5. Cloud Infrastructure Services
6. Authentication Services
7. Database Systems",
  "usage_context": "Primary users include:
1. Owner/Administrator (primary user)
2. Authorized human collaborators (future)
3. Connected AI systems via API access (ChatGPT)

Usage scenarios:
1. Rapid application prototyping and development
2. Code generation and optimization
3. Automated testing and deployment
4. System integration and API development",
  "last_updated": "{{timestamp}}",
  "version": "0.1.0"
}

components.title: Initialize Context
components.description: Performs initial setup of agent context

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Perform initial setup of the agent's purpose, goals, and contextual information

components.title: Initialize Context
components.description: Sets up initial agent context information

data.description: Initialize the standalone runtime environment with necessary configurations

data.prompt:
Generate a configuration for a standalone runtime environment with these parameters:

Storage Path: {{storage_path}}
Log Level: {{log_level}}
Config File: {{config_file}}

The configuration should include:
1. Engine settings (memory limits, thread management)
2. Component execution settings
3. API access management
4. Security protocols
5. Persistence layer configuration

Return the configuration as a structured JSON object.

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Execute a specific workflow in the standalone runtime environment

components.title: Runtime Execute
components.description: Executes a workflow in the standalone runtime

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Check the status of the standalone runtime environment

components.title: Runtime Status
components.description: Checks the status of the runtime environment

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Export the entire agent for standalone execution in other environments

components.title: Export Runtime
components.description: Exports the agent for standalone execution

data.prompt:
Generate a package configuration for exporting the Task Executor agent to the {{target_platform}} platform.

The package should include:
1. Runtime environment setup
2. Component execution engine
3. Workflow management system
4. Data persistence layer
5. {{#if include_data}}Initial data and context{{/if}}

Provide details on:
- Required dependencies
- Directory structure
- Configuration files
- Installation instructions
- {{target_platform}}-specific optimizations

components.name: APIEndpoint

data.description: Perform a guided sequential test of the runtime environment

components.title: Guided Test
components.description: Runs a sequential test of the runtime environment

data.prompt:
Generate test parameters for a guided runtime test with these inputs:

Storage Path: {{storage_path}}
Test Workflow: {{test_workflow}}

Provide:
1. Appropriate default values for any missing parameters
2. Test sequence description
3. Expected outcomes for each test step

Format the response as structured JSON with fields for each test step.

Analyze the following test results from the runtime environment tests:

```json
{{results}}
```

Provide a clear explanation of:
1. What each test step did
2. Whether it was successful
3. What the results mean
4. Any next steps or recommendations

Format this as a user-friendly report with headings and bullet points.

shortDescription: An intelligent agent that receives natural language tasks, can modify itself, deploy applications, log activities, and simulate tasks before executing them. Designed for users with no coding experience.
behavior: You are a helpful assistant that receives tasks in natural language. You carefully analyze each request to understand what the user wants. For each task, you first simulate what would happen, then explain the plan to the user and ask for confirmation before executing it. You maintain detailed logs of all actions. You can modify your own workflows and help deploy chatbot applications as requested. You always take direction only from your user and explain tasks in non-technical language. You maintain context about your purpose, goals, and progress status to ensure continuity between sessions.
introMessage: Hi, I'm Task Executor. How can I help you today?

templateInfo.name: Task Executor
templateInfo.description: An intelligent agent that receives natural language tasks, can modify itself, deploy applications, log activities, and simulate tasks before executing them. Designed for users with no coding experience.
